author: Staff Reporter
text:
Kerala Sahitya Akademi awards for 2014 have been declared. M. Thomas Mathew and Kavalam Narayana Panicker have been selected for honorary membership for the year 2014.

Sreedharan Chambad, Velayudhan Panikkassery, George Irumbayam, Methil Radhakrishnan, Desamangalam Ramakrishnan and Chadrakala S. Kamath have been selected for life-time achievement awards. The other awards are: P.N. Gopikrishnan (poetry - Idikkaloori Panambattadi ); T.P. Rajeevan (novel – K.T.N. Kottur-Ezhuthum Jeevithavum ); V.K. Prabhakaran (drama- Ettettu Malayalan )); V.R. Sudheesh (short story- Bhavana Bhedanam ); M. Gangadharan (literary criticism - Unarvinte Lahariyilekku ); and M. Sivaprasad (child literature - Anathookkam Velli ).
title: Sahitya Akademi awards announced
